instructions: Tap Library, tap Playlists, then tap New Playlist. Enter a name and description. Tap the Camera button , then take a photo or choose an image from your photo library. The image is used for the playlist s cover art. Tap Add Music, then select music to add to the playlist.
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Drive app . At the top, tap Search Drive . Type a word or phrase in the search box. On your keyboard, tap Search .

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Drive app . At the top, tap Search Drive . Choose from the following options: File types : Such as documents, images, or PDFs. Date modified : The date a file was last edited. Owned by : Whether the file belongs to you or someone else Type a word or phrase in the search box. On your keyboard, tap Search .
